Trade/Device Name(s): UCP Rapid™M Drug Screening Tricyclic Antidepressant Test Strips
UCP Rapid™ Drug Screening Tricyclic Antidepressant Test Devices
UCP Rapid Drug Screening Propoxyphene Test Devices
UCP Rapid™ Drug Screening Tricyclic Antidepressant Test
UCP Rapid™ Drug Screening Propoxyphene Test
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for UCP Rapid Drug Screening Tricyclic Antidepressant and Propoxyphene Tests using immunochromatographic, lateral flow qualitative assay for urine drug screening
Indications for Use Summary: Rapid, qualitative immunoassays for detection of Tricyclic Antidepressants and Propoxyphene (and their metabolites) in human urine at specified cutoff concentrations, providing preliminary results requiring confirmation by other methods.
